issue.title: [CF 349] Redirect (PLAYER_TARGET_CHANGED Event)
issue.body:
i am trying to set up a redirect icon whenever the spell is off cooldown and my target has changed. maybe there is a cleaner way to check for cp on the lasttarget and somehow link this to the condition. as of now i think i might need to add the above mentioned event into the conditions lua check, but i can't seem to make it work. thanks for your help!

^1^T^SType^Sconditionicon ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBO ^SUnit^Starget ^t^N2^T ^SType^SSPELLCD ^SName^SRedirect ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SEnabled^B ^SName^SRedirect ^t^N46705^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user yeahno | Imported from CurseForge issue #349 | Raw

comments.body:
There is no surefire way to check for combo points on your last target because it probably won't have a unitID associated with it. This is probably something best tracked in your head - there are too many limitations in the API to check it reliably with an addon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

well there should be a workaround, but i can't test it until tomorrow. as both snd and recup are still usable with cp on the former target, it should be possible to link an

action usable snd condition with spell cooldown == 0 redirect and target cp == 0

the only flaw "should" be the 25 energy requirment for snd usable condition to fire .

Edited Nov 26, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user yeahno

If that's what you want to do, I would use a reactive icon to check SND because it has the option to ignore the energy requirement that makes it act unusable, and then use an icon shown condition to check the reactive icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

thanks a lot cybeloras, works perfectly. posting the import string for people who migth want it:

^1^T^SType^Sreactive ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBO ^SUnit^Starget ^t^N2^T ^SType^SSPELLCD ^SName^SRedirect ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SCustomTex^SRedirect ^SEnabled^B ^SName^SSlice`and`Dice ^SIgnoreNomana^B ^t^N46705^S`| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user yeahno

Cleaned it up a tad, substituted in spellIDs, fixed source format corruption:

^1^T^SType^Sreactive ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBO ^SUnit^Starget ^t^N2^T ^SType^SSPELLCD ^SName^S73981 ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SCustomTex^S73981 ^SEnabled^B ^SName^S5171 ^SIgnoreNomana^B ^t^N46705^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Oh, I just realized that I lied. I forgot that I added the "Ignore lack of power" setting to the reactive ability condition. So actually, you dont need to use a reactive icon to check SnD at all. You can do it with a condition.

Here is the re-revised export string, with some extra features: (shows at 25% opacity when redirect is on cooldown with less than 10 seconds remaining)

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SUnAlpha^N0.25 ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBO ^SUnit^Starget ^t^N2^T ^SType^SREACTIVE ^SChecked^B ^SName^S5171 ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SShowWhen^Salways ^SShowTimerText^B ^SEnabled^B ^SDurationMaxEnabled^B ^SName^S73981 ^SDurationMax^N10 ^SIgnoreNomana^B ^t^N46705^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
